_header: Our Father that in heaven is that is all soothful iwis
_description: Exposition of the Pater Noster — 304 lines

Lam487.First Lines:
Vre feder þat in heouene isþat is al soðful
                    iƿis…
Lam487.Last Lines:
…and gif us lauerd þat ilke gifteþat ƿe has
                    ibeten þurh halie scrifte. Amen
Lam487.Attributed Title: [P]ater noster qui est in celis etc.
Lam487.Editions:
Morris,  Richard,
                        ed.  
             Old English Homilies of the 12th and 13th Centuries.
             2 vols. 
             EETS
         o.s. 29, 34 (1867, 1868); repr. as one vol., 1988: 1.55-71.
